markdown.markdown:
::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}

Passionate about cities and transit, I research urban economics with intersections on labor and development economics. Highly #rstats and #rspatial enthusiast.


---


UFJF | Juiz de Fora, Brazil  
M.Sc. in Applied Economics | 2022 - 2024

Ibmec | Belo Horizonte, Brazil  
B.Sc. in Economics | 2017 - 2021

Cemfi Summer School | Madrid, Spain  
Quantitative Spatial Economics | 2024

UC Stone/LSE/IPEA Summer School | Brasília, Brazil  
Socioeconomic Opportunity and Inequality | Incoming

---

## Experience

IPEA | Research Assistant @ [AOP-Lab](https://www.ipea.gov.br/acessooportunidades/en/sobre/) | 2024 - present

UFJF | Research Assistant | 2023

UFJF | Teaching Assistant | 2022 - 2023

Impacto Hub | M&A Analyst | 2019 - 2021
:::



::: {.content-visible when-profile="portuguese"}

Apaixonado por cidades, pesquiso economia urbana e suas interseções com mercado de trabalho, transporte coletivo, uso do solo e desenvolvimento econômico. Entusiasta de #rstats e #rspatial.
